Summary: I would definitely recommend the Best Western at Orange plaza to all of my friends and family as being the best hotel experience that anyone could enjoy. The more than friendly staff and helpful employees along with the most modernized, and always exceptionally clean rooms makes this my all time favorite.

The room was clean and quite roomy, it had all amenities hair dryer, shampoo, conditioner, soaps. Breakfast was great with cereal, scrambled eggs, boiled eggs, oatmeal, coffee, tea, waffles and much more. I liked that I could walk 15 minutes and I was at the orange circle. Great location. Only thing is that it’s located on a main busy street, but my room was further away from the street so no problem. Staff were helpful and polite. I stayed for 4 days.
Room tip: Plenty of parking, get a room further from the Main Street, walkable to orange circle that has...
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We’re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Best Western Orange Plaza. Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our customers happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing customers like you. Thanks again, and we hope to serve you again soon.

Summary Heading: Comfortable and convenient for any trip to Orange County!
Summary: This updated property is comfortable and clean. The entire staff is friendly and helpful. There is some traffic noise which lessens as it gets later. It is convenient to every OC freeway and right down the street from the restaurants in the Orange Circle area.

clean and comfortable rooms, with excellent customer service. Recently updated flooring and furniture. The staff goes out of their way to be helpful. Good options for breakfast, with an attendant helping and keeping the eating area clean. GREAT location for Old Towne Orange
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. It is very kind of you to mention our staff and clean rooms. From management on down we put in the effort to make every guest have an enjoyable stay. We really appreciate that you noticed this and took time out of your day to write a review about it. We hope to see you back the next time you need a place to stay in the area.

Summary Heading: Extremely LOUD due to street traffic. Had to change hotels
Summary: HORRIBLY LOUD. Could not sleep at all. The noise from the street traffic (hotel is located on a huge street that is busy all hours of the night and day) is truly unbearable. Extremely disappointed. Never in my life experienced such terrible noise at a hotel & I have traveled a lot. Really the worst experience to the extent I had to book at an Airbnb last minute just to get out of there… really unfortunate since I needed to get sleep for a work conference I’m in town for…
Manager Response: Hello Lisa,  I am sorry about your experience at our hotel. Unfortunately there is not much we can do about being located on a busy street. 99.5% of our guests have no issues with the street noise. A fire station is located two blocks from us and three major hospitals are located within a 3/4 mile radius. Something to think about for future guests, although most guests have these kinds of occasional sounds in their own cities that they live in.

Summary Heading: Unbeatable price and close drive to disney
Summary: Overall it was a nice stay for an unbeatable price. But the bed and pillows weren't super comfortable, but they were tolerable. Our room had a king size bed with an extra room with a sofa couch and tv for more space. I wish the room had a full length mirror, we had to buy one at Walmart, was only 10 bucks.  Also wish it had a Microwave.  The lighting for the only mirror they had needs to be better as well. The pool was kinda small but nice to take a dip in on a super hot day. The breakfast could have had better options for the warm meal, it offered us biscuits and gravy with scrambled eggs and potatoes.  Which was good but id like some sausage and bacon added to that. Maybe ham. Idk. But overall we enjoyed our stay and would probably come back.. it only was about a 8 to 10 min
Manager Response: Hello valued guest,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza and reviewing your stay. Your detailed experience has been recognized and we will look into replacing some of our pillows in the rooms. Adding a full length mirror in all our rooms is one of our next priorities. Our hot breakfast menu changes daily as items such as scrambled eggs, waffles, bacon, biscuits and gravy, sausage, omelets, etc are rotated daily. If you’re traveling to our area gain soon, don’t hesitate to call us.

Summary Heading: TERRIBLE Experience, room with 7cm roach, and we got injured by the broken shampoo box
Summary: We had a VERY TERRIBLE experience at this hotel!!!! DO NOT GO FOR YOUR OWN SAFETY!!!!!!  I'm writing down our experience to worn everyone who is thinking about going. Their staff is VERY RUDE, the hotel is dirty, smells bad and we spotted a 7CM ROACH!!!!  The shampoo box was broken on the edge with huge cracks and caused injury on my husband's forehead during taking the shower. IT WAS VERY DANGEROUS!!!!! Their staff did NOTHING, NOT EVEN AN APOLOGIES.   I'm warning you with our true experience. DO NOT GO FOR YOUR OWN SAFETY!!!!!!!!  My husband and I, as well as 2 friends booked 5-nights (8/8-8/12) at the Best Western Orange Plaza hotel, room 218.  After finding A LARGE COCKROACH, SUPER DISGUSTING!!!!!! in our room on the third night, 8/10, we reported to the front desk staff Jay
Manager Response: Thank you for the comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are sorry that we were unable to meet your expectations during your stay. Guest satisfaction is something we strive for every day and your feedback is very much appreciated. Please know we use all feedback, both positive and constructive when reviewing the services and accommodations we provide to our guests.  If we can be of further assistance, please don't hesitate to let us know.

Summary: This hotel is located within easy walking distance to Old Towne Orange. A nice, flat walk down Chapman Ave from the hotel takes you right to the center of the historic district. The area in between has great sidewalks the entire way and felt safe to me. At the hotel, every staff member who interacted with me during my stay was outstanding. Shout out to Cindy, Jay, Michael and Teresa in appreciation for your friendliness and helpfulness!
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. Thank you for the shout out as well! The staff strives for superior customer service and clean rooms, while we are in a great location. I'm sure that your review will help many travelers as they decide where to stay. We salute you.

Summary: we stay at best western plaza motel every time we come to orange, ca. our room has always been great. no negative issues. the staff Michael, Dave and Cindy are great. the only thing we would like to see improved is to have the pool heated but it won't stop us from staying at this motel. once you find a good motel, stay with it.
Manager Response: Steve and Helen,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. We appreciate your loyalty and kind review. Repeat guests like yourself are our business and we always try to improve. Thank you again for the comments and we can't wait to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here since it wasn't too far from Disneyland but much cheaper than the hotels near Disneyland. The beds are comfortable and breakfast food was quite good and plentiful with a wide assortment.
Manager Response: Hello Traveler,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review of our property, your comments are very much valued. We really appreciate your comments regarding our breakfast. Our staff members take their roles in our industry very seriously and try, every day, to provide that quality customer service, that our guests expect.  Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Disneyland/Orange!

Summary: We have stayed at this motel occasionally over several years, as we have family nearby.  Always looked forward to a comfortable night sleep, but was disappointed on this trip with the newer hard beds. If you likes a hard bed, you'll like it.  Neither I nor my daughter liked it.  We couldn't get comfortable to go to sleep, woke up frequently in discomfort, and woke up aching in the morning.
Manager Response: Lorretta,  Thank you for being a guest at Best Western Orange Plaza for many years. It pains me to hear that you and your family did not like the new beds we put in all of our rooms when we remodeled December 2019. We wish circumstances were different and we understand that you more than likely will stay at another hotel your next trip. The entire staff wishes you the best.

Summary: The staff is always accommodating and friendly. They answer any questions you might have. Housekeeping is also quick to help in your time if need with a friendly smile. This place is close to malls, dining and a grocery store.
Manager Response: Janine,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. We appreciate your review and can't wait to see you back. You and your family are amazing.

Summary: I had some early morning business to conduct at Chapman University, so I stayed over the night before at the Best Western Orange Plaza (about a 20 minute walk to the Chapman campus). The motel's website advertises that the rooms are "newly refurbished" and this is no exaggeration! My room was spotless, and everything looked spanking new and in great shape.  Items were even wrapped in plastic due to COVID cleaning protocols. The armchair and ottoman were super comfortable for reading, the giant TV had plentiful cable channels, and the in-room coffee was great. The only downside is that the only window overlooks the passageway, so you don't have much privacy if you want to keep your curtains open to allow the lovely Southern California winter sun to stream in--but, hey, this is
Manager Response: Dear Professor Azania,  Thank you for staying Best Western Orange Plaza. We always love a good read that helps us sell the room to potential future guests. I might add that people can not see into your room if the 1st set of curtains are closed. You can see out of the room but there is no visibility into the room during the day. We would love to have you back. Please call us directly when booking a room and mention our Chapman University discount.

Summary: If you are able, book your stay as soon as you possibly can. Due to the convenience of this location, it fills up quite a bit faster than one would expect. This Best Western is right in the middle of EVERYTHING! Food, shopping, entertainment, etc.
Manager Response: DearDWDavis,  The staff sends our thank you for staying with us and reviewing the property. Your review is beneficial for future guests. We are glad that you are pleased with our location and hope to see you back.

Summary: I used to live in Orange and drove past this place for years. Now that I live out of the area and was visiting, I thought I'd give it a try. It's an older property, but you'd never guess that when you're inside. The rooms appear to have recently been renovated and are very modern, comfortable, and clean. The management was very professional and accommodating. The property felt safe and secure. Overall it was a very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Victor,  I want to thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza and taking the time to write a detailed review. Anyone reading our reviews will agree that most of our reviews are like this one. We run a tight ship and customer satisfaction is our number one goal.

Summary: This property is within walking distance of just about everything in Orange. Excellent rooms, clean & always fresh towels & hot water!!! Clean bedding & comfy room!! Very small odds & ends need addressed in each & or multiple rooms.
Manager Response: Ned,  Thank you for rating us on Trip Advisor. We appreciate your business. We will see you again.

Summary: I stay here when I come to visit my brother and family, who live in Orange. It is greatly improved since it was renovated. It is satisfactory for my needs, although it seems that very few amenities are provided. At least I found the hair dryer. I thought the scarcity of amenities might be due to Covid concerns. I do not get the breakfast, however, I would appreciate a few more coffee and sugar packets to make coffee in the room. I think the bed is comfortable and my TV worked fine. I could hear water going on and off in other rooms, and, as other reviewers have said, the water pressure in the shower isn’t very strong.  I always choose a room on the second floor to maintain a greater sense of privacy-I.e. people walking back and forth to breakfast, cars coming and going, noise
Manager Response: Clementine,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. It's great that you choose us to stay with when visiting family in the area, we truly appreciate that. We put less amenities during this pandemic because sometimes we are forced to throw away unused items like coffee packets or notepads due to possible contamination from previous guests. A tip for anyone reading this is that you can always request extra coffee or anything your heart desires from the front desk at the time of reservation, check-in or during your stay. It is of no hassle to us and we want you to have everything your need. Thank you again.

Summary: Great location! Near UCI Medical Center, plenty of places to eat, gas aand groceries across the street. Very well lit, clean and inviting facilities. Friendly responsive staff, great experience overall. Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Martha,  As I'm responding to your review, I've realized the tardiness of it. I apologize as I like to respond to every review in a timely manner. We appreciate your comments and agree with them. This is a top review that describes us and our location area. Thank you!

Summary: Really helpful, nice and pleasant staff.  Remodeled rooms are now bright and modern.  Ralph's, eating establishments, Old Towne all within walking distance.  Breakfast is provided.  Popular place for Disneyland visitors to stay.  I like that it's small versus the bigger hotels with hundreds of rooms that are noisy.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for the excellent review. We’re thrilled your time with us was so amazing! We endeavor to go above and beyond to ensure our guests have a memorable experience. We look forward to hosting you again for another fantastic experience in Orange. Have a beautiful day!

Summary: i thought id hit the jackpot. a cheap hotel, near disneyland, that has good reviews? sounds too good to be true! and it was. it should first be noted that this is a motel, and not a hotel like it's listed on various sites. the check in process was quick. the concierge was very kind. our first impressions of the room were even really good. however, everything quickly started to go downhill. while having the sink outside of the bathroom seemed like a fun idea at first, it was more annoying than anything. the actual bathroom itself is so small, you can't stand in there and shut the door at the same time. we struggled to close it without having to sit on the toilet or step into the shower. there's no privacy because every bodily sound is echoed throughout the whole room. the water
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  Thank you for taking the time to give your feedback. I'm sorry to hear the rooms weren't up to the standard you've come to expect. I have personally addressed this with our staff to ensure this won't happen again. The room phone was replaced and verified working by maintenance as he called the front desk to make sure it worked. Smoking is not allowed in our rooms or near our rooms, we would have taken care of the smoker if we were aware of the situation. We are sorry for your experience.

Summary: Rooms are clean. noise is too much from kids screaming and loud music at the pool. I felt bad as a platinum customer asking for service. 2 out of 4 of the worker had respect and understood. i was there on a business trip and could get little done due to the noise and when i checked out of the over priced, normally $90 , that i paid almost $290 a night, they had me  wait in the in the hot /humid climates as the the manger walks by not asking if i would like to sit inside or if they could offer water. guess ill have Hilton buy out my points. Waste of money, but if only staying for leisure day or so, go for it.
Manager Response: Skeesling,  Where do I start. You are a return guest who we had issues with checking out late your last stay in May. The most recent stay that you are talking about in September, you called the cops on your own guest. You complained about noise from other people when you and your friend were the ones who created a problem and called the cops on each other. I will stop here and just mention that you are a do not rent at our property. We appreciate your business but there are just too many issues that come with you.  Thank you

Summary: It wasn’t the worst experience, but the hotel needs some updating. The exterior looks shabby. The rooms are clean, but the beds and pillows are uncomfortable. The staff was rightfully cautious with COVID, but they need to find a better way to serve breakfast. We waited half an hour and left out of frustration. Fix these issues, you got a great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you very much for your candid review of your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every stay. I greatly appreciate your comments about aspects of the room that need updating.

Summary: The pool was not heated, there were crickets in our room, breakfast was o.k., we were denied a little later checkout, and now I'm leaving a review and Best Western is making me type a minimum of 200 words just so I can let others know about needed improvements. Corporate America! Sheesh!
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  I would like to apologize for my late response to your review. We have read your complaints and have a duty to reply back. Unfortunately our outdoor pool is not heated, we do have this posted on our website and staff is instructed to inform any guest who mentions the pool. It's understandable that crickets are annoying, our rooms and property are preventively sprayed for bugs every month. From time to time a cricket may survive in the plants and find a way into the room. Our staff is train to handle these situations and we would appreciate anybody to call the front desk at any hour. Late check-out is never guaranteed, however we try to comply by at least noon if we are fully staffed and do not have several other late check-outs that same day.

Summary: I recommend this BW I stay here when in town visiting family.  Always service with a smile. Rooms are always clean, check in and check out are always quick and easy. I have always enjoyed my stays and appreciate the breakfast as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for patronizing Best Western Orange Plaza, and taking time out to share your experience on this social platform. All of us are delighted that we could ensure a comfortable stay during your visit.   Thank you once again for your stay and your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back to Best Western Orange Plaza.

Summary Heading: Not if you are a light sleeper .....
Summary: The room was updated and had all the amenities needed. Breakfast foods, nice options, were served by one of the employees. The bed was firm and comfortable. HBO and MAX movie channels where available to watch - something I don't get at home. Only problem with this Best Western location, is the location. It sits on two main roads and there is alot of vehicle noise. There is a period during the night I believe the traffic subsided and sleep was acquired. I did use white noise to sleep and drown out some of the noise. Overall, it met my needs for the days I was staying there.
Manager Response: First and foremost thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We like like to express our apologies for your lack of sleep at our hotel. Most guests feel that our hotel is quiet however we understand that the street noise does have an impact to some guests.   We hope that you find a hotel that meets your needs the next time you stay in the area.

Summary: Can’t complain excellent service rooms are amazing perfect location to stores restaurants etc. I would recommend to friends and family I will always come back again and again and again EXCELLENT 👍👍👍
Manager Response: You and your response are terrific. If we could give you five stars we would. Thank you for this amazing review and we hope to keep you coming back. May the rest of 2021 be powerful for you.

Summary: my only complaint is that they don't offer or honor my diamond loyalty status with allowing my party a late checkout neither was I able to receive a upgrade to a nicer room marriot bonvoy is easily a better choice for travel.
Manager Response: Kevin, My apologies that you were not allowed a late checkout. As manager, I will take the blame for this. I have let the front desk agents know to be stricter on late checkouts since there is a rise in requests this year and it affects our abilities to get our rooms ready by check-in time 3 pm, since we are a 33 room property that usually sells out. The front desk will be taught and they have been trained this in the past, we always accept late checkouts for diamond members. While I would agree that the Marriot Bonvoy probably has nicer rooms, I would also add they probably run at least twice the price.

Summary: I first learned of Best Western while traveling across country with a friend of mine. My friend had mad all the hotel reservations. I was very impressed by the consistency of Best Western throughout the states. So the next time I had to travel that’s the way I went.
Manager Response: I'm glad that you keep your hotel stays in the Best Western family. It's true that Best Westerns are subjected to yearly inspections and everything to pillows is graded. We do our best to uphold the quality of the Best Western brand name.

Summary: Older hotel, but nicely updated! Have stayed at this hotel three times and staff is great! Due to COVID-19 there were changes in the breakfast routine, but the staff rolled with the flow and were fabulous!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying and reviewing our location. We always try to keep improving on what we do. We hope to continue hosting you in the future. Thank you again.

Summary: I stayed for three nights and I as quite pleased. The room was clean although it was dirty under the lip of the sink. There were only a few tissues left in the box and I didn’t see a blow dryer, which usually comes in the rooms of hotels these days. The towels are also small in size relative to the usual sized bath towels. I did enjoy my stay though-I appreciated the fact that I couldn’t hear noises in adjoining rooms and the bed was quite comfortable, despite a relatively thin blanket.  These are minor complaints, though, and I consider it a very good place to stay at a good price!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you stay with us at Best Western Orange Plaza. Your high rating of our hotel assures other potential guests of what to expect and it’s a boost of confidence. Look us up for your next trip in the area.

Summary: customer service was phenomenal they made us feel welcome met our needs covered everything down to the snacks just very thorough rare and one of kind courteousness from beginning to end.... they make you feel so welcome and comfortable tht you look forward to going back
Manager Response: Thank you for honoring Best Western Orange Plaza with high scores. Please accept our offer to stay another time and receive 15% off of the non-discounted rate.  In order to receive this discount, please call us directly at 714-633-7720, mention this email when booking reservation and bring a printed copy with you at check in.  Thank you again for taking the time to complete the survey. We appreciate your loyalty to our brand.   Sincerely,  Michael Nuño Manager Best Western Orange Plaza  Each Best Western® hotel is independently owned and operated.  Thank you for staying at our hotel and leaving a review. We are collecting response information from guests like yourself and turning it into ideas that will make us better for future visits. We wish you a healthy and safe 2021.

Summary: We stay here for appointments  at CHOC— Groceries/Starbucks across the street . Mall within walking distance.Close to Disneyland, (when open) and can connect to busses to take you there. Staff is great
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give incite about our hotel. This helps potential guests find us and we appreciate your thoughtfulness. It's always great to see you. We hope you and the family are well.

Summary: They took great care of me, I had an injury and the hostess was able top find me a room on the 1st floor. Rooms have been recently remodeled. Very bright and clean. Hot breakfast and centrally located. I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Best Western Orange Plaza and for taking the time to provide feedback about your experience. We value your opinion so we can continue to improve the service we offer. It was a great pleasure for me to read the comments you submitted.  One of the greatest rewards of my job is receiving encouraging feedback such as yours. Our staff at Best Western Orange Plaza takes pride in creating a memorable "home away from home" for our guests. Hearing that we have accomplished that goal means that we have delivered you the value and experience you expect and deserve.  Thank you again for your positive comments. I have shared them with our entire team as well as our senior management. We look forward to hosting you many times over at Best Western Orange Plaza.  If I can be of assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to contact me at 714-633-7720.  Sincerely,  Michael Nuño Manager Best Western Orange Plaza

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. They let us have a late check- out which was very beneficial for me since I have to do a regimen of medicines after I eat breakfast. And they allowed me to have a late check-out which is very much appreciated. Breakfast was good the lady that was helping us with super friendly and the food was hot and good. We were able to park in front of her room since I am partially disabled it was helpful I would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: You are wonderful, thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. The staff will always try to accommodate our guests and I'm glad that we were able to do our job for you. We hope to see you back.

Summary: We had booked the 1 king and 1 double was the best my husband and I had pur privacy and my cousin had her own bed in the main room. The only thing was that our private room did not have a TV but overall satisfied
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us in October. All rooms that have side rooms like the one you stayed in now have TV's mounted in them. We appreciate your review score and details. It would be our pleasure if you would stay with us again in the future.

Summary: after staying at a larger best western I was extremely surprised to find this small quaint building. Lobby and entire building recently remoldeld. Front desk staff extremely sweet and courteous. While the larger best western I had stayed at did not have grab n go bags or any type of breakfast this one offered both.  Actual breakfast was modified but still fresh and warm.  Now we did book a king suit.  This place is not a true suit. Its just a small extra room with pull out couch. The layout could be a little bit better but the fantastic customer service made up for the lack of size in the room. Oh and the bed was truly amazing I did not want to get out of bed. Even the sofa bed was newer and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. Your review displays many facets of our business. We are trained well and do put forth the effort to make each and every experience enjoyable.

Summary Heading: BEST HOTEL IN SANTA ANA AREA!!!!
Summary: I drove from san diego to santa ana for a work related trip and stayed at this hotel for two weeks. The staff was extremely pleasant and polite, there customer service was awesome and very accommodating, everyone at the front desk was so helpful and available 24/7. Everyone went above and beyond to see that we were comfortable and had everything we needed during our stay. The rooms were very clean, the outside atmosphere was so nice and most of all... quiet, so you can relax! We had such a positive stay and hope to be back soon.. book your next hotel reservation here, you will not regret it!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your stay at Best Western Orange Plaza. Your review is thorough and informative. You have sold our hotel to this captive audience. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay here. It was a fast and easy check in with polite staff. The room was very clean with lots of space and amenities. I loved the shower pressure and the soap dispensers is a great idea, not cheap skin/hair drying products either. The beds were plenty comfortable. It was nice and quiet, not noisy as other hotels I have stayed at. The area had many different choices of restaurants nearby which was another plus. I will definitely recommend family and friends to stay here! You have a returning guest here as well!
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you stay with us at Best Western Orange Plaza. Your high rating of our hotel assures other potential guests of what to expect and it’s a boost of confidence. I liked reading all the points you touched on. Look us up for your next trip in the area.

Summary Heading: Don't arrive hungry or expect a soft bed!
Summary: I arrived at midnight counting on a microwave in the room like every other place I've stayed...wrong! This property was just renovated so it was intentional! The room has super bright overhead lights and a very hard mattress (just like the BW in Placentia) after their renovation! Sleep was impossible between the bed, neighbor noise above and the staff talking very loudly amongst themselves in front of the rooms at 8 a.m. No detectable perks for BW rewards members and no breakfast. Hopefully your stay is better than mine was!
Manager Response: My apologies for my tardy response of more than a year. I will be the first one to let everyone know that we do not have microwaves in the rooms. Access to a microwave is available 24 hrs in the lobby, we have only 33 rooms so the distance from any room to the lobby is short. We are a basic Best Western and not a Plus or Premier which are required to have microwaves in the rooms. We have made a decision to not have microwaves in rooms based on the smell that would be left in the rooms. The mattresses were changed out during our remodel, we had received previous complaints that our mattresses were too soft. The secondary reason for changing the mattresses was to protect our housekeepers from injury as the softer mattresses were much heavier. The comment that irks me is the no breakfast. We are proud to advertise that we are one of the few hotels that not only remained open during the pandemic but continued to serve breakfast within the guidelines of the CDC, City of Orange, and Best Western. Lastly, Best Western Reward members always get a discount on our rooms, points for their stay, and if you're an elite member you receive bonus points.

Summary: The rooms are clean and lovely with nice touches and amenities. The beds are super comfortable. The motel although old well taken care of and going through exterior upgrades. The staff professional and accommodating.
Manager Response: I apologize for responding to your review more than a year later. I just had to respond to such amazing feedback. We do try to offer the best customer service and the staff is well trained. Thank you for your support and we hope that you stay with us again.

Summary: My husband had a few Dr Visits @ St Joseph Pavilion & this location was perfectly located on Chapman & Main St in Orange.  Sandy attending the Front Desk is the KINDEST & most helpful Hotel Staff Member I have EVER met!!  I can say this on good authority because I have flown the world over as a Flight Attendant for a Major Airline.  This isn’t a 5 Star Resort property but she makes you feel that welcomed. I’m a Diamond Select Best Western Member & a Hilton Diamond Member so I have been welcomed @ many Hotels to achieve that status.  The rooms are newly refurbished & clean!  Complementary Breakfast in the morning.  I will stay again....SOON!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such a wonderful review and for taking the time to write. I'm glad and frankly not surprised that Sandy T offered up the best customer service experience by a hotel staff member, you have ever had. We believe that hospitality is personal and it all starts with a dedicated and caring team.

Summary: Exceptional leadership! Michael makes sure his guests feel very welcome, a home away from home - thank you! This is a very convenient location and we have returned many times before. I would recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for making my day. The entire staff really enjoys having you and your family stay with us. Maybe someday you will be back, there's a lot to do in Southern California. We hope you and your family are having a safe and healthy 2020.

Summary: The hotel rooms were recently renovated and were very nice. You definitely get a very nice room for a great value. The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful! I would absolutely stay here again even though it was under construction.
Manager Response: Melissa,  Thank you for staying with us during our remodel. We appreciate on how you were able to see the brighter side of things. We hope to see you back in the future and want to offer you a price discount for being such a trooper. Print this response out and I will give you a better rate than what you booked for your next stay. Have a safe and healthy 2020.

Summary: All of the employees at this hotel were friendly, courteous and very helpful. Along with the updated and clean rooms, they made our trip a very enjoyable and pleasant experience. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review of our property. We get trained  in customer service and take pride in how we run our hotel. We hope to see you back in the future. We wish you a safe and healthy 2020.

Summary: This is a small motel on the West side of Orange, CA, on Chapman Ave,  We stay here often when visiting family.  Over the years the accommodations have been upgraded.   It is a pleasure to stay at a motel that has a TV remote control that uses the local TV station numbers - no searching a guide to find what is familiar.  The controls on the heater/AC were also easy to use.  Our laptop connects to the Wi-fi with no problem.  Apparently the style for pillows is big and lumpy which is not our preference.   We always specify a first floor room because as we age we have problems with stairways. We will be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for always coming back to Best Western Orange Plaza. We appreciate your feedback, the details in it are gems. As a staff and business we care for every guest and aspire to be helpful in nature, just as helpful as your review.

Summary: The staff from the front desk to the cleaning staff were very friendly and helpful, They made my stay feel like home. The hotel is going renovations and I got the pleasure to stay in a new room as well as one that had not been renovated and the new look is brighter and definitely better.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. We are glad that you got the full experience and felt at home. The remodel is scheduled to end late March, we hope that you can see the finished product.

Summary: Clean motel.Nice continental breakfast.Susan ( hope I remembered the name correctly) even was able to move us to a downstairs room so my wife would not have to do the stairs.THANKS ! Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Ken,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. I'm glad our hard work is making a difference to you and others. We follow procedures that ensure guest satisfaction. We can't wait to see you back.

Summary: The hotel appearance looks overall “okay”. Nothing that screams comfort or anything.  The hotel staff was friendly although did not make it easy to check in when i decided to book an extra night and even gave me a room someone was still in!
Manager Response: Michael,  We are proud to be highly rated because of our staff and cleanliness. Currently we are remodeling 1/4 of our property at a time, because of this we are short many rooms until 2020. I have responded to your other Best Western review and let you know the details of the mishap. I assure you that guest privacy is our #1 concern and something like this never happens and will never happen on my watch. Whenever there is a mistake, I fix it and it doesn't happen again.

Summary: I booked this trip for aconference. The holel is located just off the 57 freeway and was in very close proximity to my destination. This was an ovrnight trip, so I did not spend too much time in the room, but I was pleasantly comfortable. It was quiet and I felt safe in my environment inside and outside the hotel and it's general area. The bed was more than comfortable, I enjoyed a nice hot shower and had all the amenities that other larger hotels offfer including a fridge, personal care itens, coffee maker with creamers etc, a c;oset with an ironing board and iron a nice size television with remote in a clean sleeve.  A writing desk and  dining table. On site parking was avaialbel at no extra cost as was the breakfast. There is constuction going on at the hotel, but it did not
Manager Response: Leti,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. This review helps the staff and hotel reach its goal. We can't wait to have you back. The remodel is slated to be completed by 2020 and we want you to stay so that we can get your feedback. Thank you again.

Summary: This hotel is centrally located with many dining options nearby, etc...It is close to Chapman University as well as OCCH. It is also walking distance to Main shopping Mall along with Orange Circle which also offers many shops and dining establishments. The staff at this hotel is excellent!
Manager Response: Lorraine,  Thank you for being a return guest. The information you have posted is invaluable. We truly enjoy having you stay with us. We hope that we can book you into one of our remodeled rooms, your next stay.

Summary: I stay here several times a year visiting my grandchildren. The condition and service is very predictable and always in the high range. Property is centrally located in Orange county. Rooms are always clean and well maintained. Office staff is very helpful and friendly. The breakfast is nice any saves time not needing to go to a restaurant. Rooms are always clean and beds comfortable. Has good TV service with some premium channels if you are spending any time in the room.
Manager Response: Paul,  It's always great having you stay at Best Western Orange Plaza. We have started remodelling our rooms and should be done by the start of 2020. It would be great to see you then and you could let us know what you think.

Summary: This hotel is a great place to stay for its comfort, friendly service and great breakfast area. The rooms are clean & great beds.  It seemed that everyone went out of their way to make us feel welcome.
Manager Response: Karlene,  Thank you for getting away at Best Western Orange Plaza. Your enthusiasm in your review matches how we feel about our guests, which includes you. We are currently making improvements to the hotel and we want you to experience our remodelled rooms when they are done at the start of 2020.

Summary: Great rooms and service! Breakfast super!!! Front desk people give good info on all the places around the hotel. The maid stopped everything to get are room ready because we needed to get ready for The Rolling Stones concert.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing about your Best Western Orange Plaza experience. The staff puts in optimal effort and it gives us an accomplished feeling when we read comments like yours. You will always have a place to stay here anytime you visit the area.

Summary: Our son is going to Chapman University and we found the Best Western to be the closest hotel to campus .9 miles away!  The staff is amazing and the rooms were clean and comfortable!  Michael & Davey were soo friendly!  We will be back again and again!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Marcia,  It was a pleasure to house you and your family. We look forward to many visits, and congratulations when it's time for your son to graduate in a few years. Give us a call anytime.

Summary: We moved are son into Chapman university this week! The staff Michael and Davey were top notch!! This hotel is .9 miles away from campus! The rooms were clean and comfortable. The retail shops surrounding the hotel made it easy to pick up anything we needed! Thank you Michael and your team for making our stay such a special one!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time and effort to review our property after having the Best Western Orange Plaza experience. You and your family are quite thoughtful. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay in Orange
Summary: A very nice hotel for the price in this location. Exceeded expectations. Clean, quiet, pleasant staff, nice breakfast.  Used room with a side-room and a second bed. This was quite helpful for the family. AC critical due to very hot weather; worked fine. No issues.
Manager Response: David,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. Your review is amazing and it helps us understand the guest's side of things. You're great as well and we hope to see you back after our remodel late this year.

Summary Heading: Clean, nice pool, great location and great breakfast
Summary: Booked this for a business trip to Orange. Excellent location close to CHOC, and a very good Mexican restaurant just a block away (The Chili Pepper). Free breakfast was amazing, lots of choices and very clean. Nice pool outside to cool down!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to leave us a review. You left some great tips for future guests. we hope to see you back anytime you visit the area again.

Summary: Well maintained, quiet, attractive hotel minutes from downtown Orange, Disneyland, Chapman University and Santiago Canyon College. Free hot breakfast with eggs, sausage, bacon, waffles, biscuits & gravy, and coffee. I was there attending a 5 day USSF C License course and was a mere 15 minutes from the field and classroom. I loved it so much the first 5 days I stayed there 2 months later the other 5 days!
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback regarding our hotel and the city of Orange. We enjoy meeting new people every day and putting smiles on faces. Our goal is to do such a good job that our guests keep coming back and I'm glad we fulfilled that with you.

Summary: OK place to spend the night if you have business in the area or going to Disneyland.  Clean but old and in a very commercial and noisy area.  Although the beds were comfortable and the noise wasn't bad at night.  The staff was very friendly and helpful!!!
Manager Response: Barbara,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your honesty. The staff looks forward to stepping up our game so that we can earn some five scores.

Summary: Can hear water being turned on from the other rooms. The room we stayed 2 queen bed  n guest room. We had one sink in bathroom , no vanity. No laundry service available at hotel. Same breakfast everyday, kitchen was kind a small, so we end up standing n eating in kitchen , hotel odor, and can see pipe under bathroom sink. The cleanliness was okay.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for staying at our hotel. The room that you reserved online was our ADA room otherwise, all of our rooms have a vanity and sink outside of the bathroom. Reviews help guests decide where to stay and I thank you for mentioning that we do not have laundry service at this hotel. I also want to add that our breakfast room has five tables and 12 chairs, alternatively, there is another table with 4 chairs in the lobby and two tables outside the lobby with 4 more chairs. If I was present at that point in time I would have found a solution for you and your family as I expect my staff to do the same. Lastly, I'm glad that you mentioned that we were clean because we take pride in this. The Best Western Orange Plaza family hopes that you find a hotel that suits your families needs the next time you are in the area.   Than you again for staying with us and leaving a review.

Summary Heading: Good for business trip or a family trip to Disneyland!
Summary: I recently became a frequent guest of Best Western. This hotel looks a bit old,  but I love the size of the room, the amenities, the cleanliness, and the fact it came with free WiFi and breakfast. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Close from shopping centers and restaurants. Would suggest to have recycle bin in the guest rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you for becoming a frequent guest of Best Western. We are glad that you stayed with us and enjoyed what we have to offer. We have a remodel up-coming that keeps getting pushed back but as of now the idea to start after Labor Day. I hope that you come back and visit the next time you are in the area and we will work on getting recycle bins in the rooms. FYI the housekeepers do recycle the bottles, glass, and cans but we still want to put recycle bins.

Summary: Beautiful hotel; great location; friendly staff.  This BW has it all!    It is very close to Disneyland, freeways, other cities, shopping, restaurants, etc.  Property is very clean; has a beautiful pool and grounds. Would highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for the top notch review Desert Duo. I really appreciate reading that you have confirmed that I and my staff are doing a good job with our property. It's nice to hear and read compliments like this because we care so much for our guests. We hope to see you again.

Summary: Good hotel for the money you pay. Looks a little dated and some may find the soap dispensers a bit of a hassle to deal with (you have to push a bunch of times to get a good amount of soap). Great breakfast selection: waffles, bacon, eggs, biscuits, sausages etc. Best of all the staff is very attentive. Front desk staff is very nice and ready to assist. Important note: This hotel can be a little noisy due to the fact that it’s basically on the street. The area has supermarket, Marshall’s and restaurants within walking distance, so that’s a plus.
Manager Response: Nelva, Thank you for reviewing Best Western Orange Plaza. Your review hits the spot except for the score. I'm glad that other potential guests will read this and have the chance to choose whether to stay with us. I'm confident more than not guests will give us a try.

Summary: This Best Western was probably one of the best ones I've stayed in.  The owner was super friendly and also helped staff stalked the breakfast area.  I felt welcomed and not just a person passing through.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza. We appreciate the time you have taken to review our property. Your review is why I love my job because I like helping people and making everyone's day better. See you soon, we hope.

Summary Heading: Best kept secret in Orange, CA
Summary: I always stay at the Best Western Orange Plaza hotel when in the Anaheim, CA area. It is clean and well run and the staff is top rate.  The breakfast gets you going in the morning and the comfortable and clean guest rooms are always welcoming at night.
Manager Response: David,  Your review put a smile on every staff members face when they read it. We are excited to have you as a frequent guest when in town. We are always open for you sir.

Summary Heading: Great Little Motel- slept like a baby!
Summary: Great Value! Perfect hotel if you’re going to Chapman for something.   I really love this little place and have stayed there often.  It’s extremly low key and I always sleep well.  Great Breakfast.  The staff is friendly and helpful.   They have a great breakfast with plenty of choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving such a great and informative review. It looks like we hit all the key points for you, this is not by accident, we do everything we can. We love having guests who appreciate what we have to offer.   Thank you for honoring Best Western Orange Plaza with high praises. Please accept our offer to stay another time and receive 15% off of the non-discounted rate.  In order to receive this discount, please call us directly at 714-633-7720, mention this email when booking reservation and bring a printed copy with you at check in.

Summary: We stayed while visiting to watch the Ducks play hockey. Our stay was very pleasant. The room was large and comfortable. The staff at the Hotel went above and beyond to ensure our comfort. We will always chose this Best Western to stay at when in town.
Manager Response: Peter,  We are so glad that we could be a piece of your paradise in Anaheim. Wow, it looks like we have another regular for Ducks hockey games. Please book your next stay with us directly, when calling mention this post and receive 15% off your next stay.

Summary: I like the location  and the appearance of the room. The staff was very nice and helpful. Only issue was the walls were very thin, you can here noise from the outside  the water pipes must be old since you can hear them when being used even from other rooms
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property. We appreciate the good vibes that you sent our way. I'm sorry to hear about the noise that heard through the walls. Whenever we get our next remodel, I will mention this to the contractors to see if they can do anything about this. We appreciate your business and hope to see you back.

Summary: This was a great motel.  The location was fantastic, the staff was very friendly, and they had a very good free breakfast.  I also really liked that there are fridges in the rooms and a microwave in the lobby for guests to use.  It was a little noisier than I expected but it was fine.  I am a very light sleeper and I had no problem getting to sleep.
Manager Response: What a fantastic way to start my day by reading a great review like this. I'm glad that you were so informative in this review, it will help the thousands of people who will read this overtime. We hope to see you back the next time you need to stay in the area.

Summary: We were evacuated due to the mud slides and we were able to get a room the same day for a very good price the room was very clean and upgraded the breakfast was amazing ever morning the room was cleaned daily and the service was excellent
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that you were involved in the mudslide evacuation. It brings a smile to the employees here that we were able to be a positive in this time of need. Thank you for the positive review as it helps put us on the map. Let us know if you ever need a room because we want to offer you the best possible rate that we can.

Summary: Very nice and clean room. Good breakfast. Several options (Cereal, Waffles, Bagels, fruits, bread, coffee, juice and pastries) Friendly staff. Nice service. Location closer to Disneyland. Good value for the money.
Manager Response: We are glad that glad that you found us on your voyage. The staff appreciates that you reviewed your exploration. The next time you set out for Orange County please give us a call.

Summary: Caring front desk person, Sandy and Cindy. Sandy described the hotel and location, and amenities true to what I saw and experienced. Great customer service. I always think that the start of a hotel experience starts with the front desk personal, so I knew my experience would be a nice one once I interacted with Sandy.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza, where we truly care for every guest. The staff is well trained at providing top notch customer service and housekeeping makes sure every room is clean and comfortable. We hope to see you back in the future.  Happy Holidays.

Summary: Extremely well maintained and clean Best Western. Found no fault at all with this facility. A minor thing would have liked to have seen in the room was an easy access receptacle near the bed to plug my phone into but that's no big issue.  The staff was extremely helpful and pleasant. Check-in was great.  Giant flat screen TV too!
Manager Response: Timothy,  Thank you for staying and reviewing our property. We do take pride in having clean rooms at our hotel, thank you for noticing that. We will use your feedback to further improve the rooms. Please come back that next time you need a room in the area.

Summary: This is in a good spot in Orange, plenty of food within walking distance. Main Place Mall is very close which is super convenient. Did not use the pool but it looked nice. I like staying in Orange because it's very central to everything in Orange County. Sandy at the Front Desk was particularly nice and the highlight of our stay. A good staff with solid amenities beats other hotel competition any day.
Manager Response: Yvette,  Thank you for taking the Best Western Orange Plaza experience. The front desk, housekeeping, maintenance and management appreciate your comments. Your views on the location and highlights are beneficial to all who read this and we thank you.

Summary: Look no further. This is home away from home. The rooms are clean and spacious. The entire staff are friendly and very helpful to fulfill any request. And your easy check in and check out service couldn't be anymore better. Everything you need is at your fingertips. Plus if you forgot to pack and necessaries the front office has what you need with their compliments.   You will enjoy your stay and never stay anywhere else again.
Manager Response: Dawnie and Kyle,  Thank you for staying at Best Western Orange Plaza and becoming one of our family. We appreciate your loyalty to our location. The entire staff puts in quality effort and we are thankful that you recognize the hard work.   Hope to see you back soon as always.

Summary: We had been to a car show in Anaheim and Cindy and Sandy on the desk went out of their way to make sure we were parked in a space directly outside of our room and where there our classic car would be protected.   The hotel is also within walking distance of several decent restaurants and we felt safe walking to them.  The room is clean and we had a great breakfast. We've been here before and will come again.

Very nice comfortable hotel.  Clean, quiet, great free breakfast, rooms nice, updated, not too big.  Very close to Orange Circle .  Close to 57 freeway.  Exterior clean, could be brightened up a bit.  Not fancy but just plain good!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and leaving such an informative review. It's great to read such positive feedback that other potential guests can use to make a decision. We know that we have an older hotel but we make the best out of it with customer service and clean rooms. Thanks again.

Summary Heading: Quick Trip to Orange for Wedding
Summary: Exemplary staff, easy walk to everything (grocery store, restaurants/quick bites, coffee shops), close proximity to the wedding and reception venue for the wedding we were attending.  Stayed on the 2nd floor and was able to see Disney fireworks at night. :) As we were leaving we realized how close this was to Disneyland and would definitely choose this hotel again if we were going to be in the area for an overnight Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our hotel and mentioning what you liked about your stay. This is a very informative review and will help future potential guests decide to book with us. We can't wait to host you again.

Summary Heading: great for parents, close to the school
Summary: this is a great hotel with friendly owners who care. The breakfast is great and the location can't be beat. The beds are super comfy. The lobby is beautiful. A great value except graduation week-end when they jack up the price.
Manager Response: We do like to think of our hotel as Chapman parents home away form home. We have Chapman parents and recruits staying with us year round so make sure to book special events like parents weekend and graduation months in advance.   We appreciate your sound feedback and always enjoy commenting back.  Thank you

Summary Heading: BW Orange Plaza is our first choice for hotels in the Anaheim area.
Summary: This hotel is perfect for us. The room with two Queen and one double bed are exactly what we need as a family of 5. The location is perfect, a grocery store across the street & Angel Stadium 5 minutes away.
Manager Response: I like the name "SoCAlBeachFreak". The team thanks you and family for allowing us to host the fam. We will always be here for you and look out for future improvements to the staff and property.  Thank you for staying and leaving a positive review.

Summary: Parking was good and closeby, the reception was pleasant and efficient. The bed was too soft for me. The internet was complex. There was noise outside my room, both when I tried to sleep, and early in the morning. The breakfast was just a continental breakfast, something to nibble on.
Manager Response: Stephen,  Thank you for staying with us. We were more than honored to have your family with us. We will be using your feedback to fine tune the perfect stay for our guests. Your satisfaction is our #1 priority.

Summary: This has to be the cleanest Best Western I have ever seen. Staff is great, friendly and fast. Not one thing that we could complain about. Its a simply hotel but it is a great place to stay. A bit nousy due to being on a main road but not too bad.
Manager Response: Heide,  Thank you very much for giving us a chance to host you as a guest. We are very happy that you liked us and appreciated all of our hard work. The staff puts in max effort to make sure you have a comfortable stay. You have truly described us in a nutshell and we can not thank you enough.

Summary: This hotel is located near freeways and is easy to locate.  It is convenient to restaurants and tourist areas alike.  The parking lot is well lit.  As a woman traveling alone, I felt very safe.  The room was extremely clean and comfortable.  Breakfast had a variety of items and the breakfast area was clean.  I will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a chance and staying with us. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and relayed your experiences with potential future guests. We will always be here to welcome you back if you and when you have the need to stay in Orange.  Safe travels.

Summary: We had 6 people and stayed in a room with 3 beds. We had our own private room away from the kids. The staff was excellent and breakfast was always stocked and ready. Good location and easy to find. We would stay again.
Manager Response: David,  Your review is energizing and were happy you think we are great, because we think you are great. Everyone of our staff cares about our guests and we are happy that you noticed. I would like to thank you in person during your next stay with us. Please stop by the front desk to see me and if there is anything I can do during your stay to make it that much more enjoyable, I will do it.

Summary Heading: Bad experience, good location but old and dirty
Summary: Dirty, old, old beds, wind current filter in and we got sick, toilet clogged for no reason, very covenient location though about to get groceries. Smells like humidity. Dirty rugs. We are not too picky but for the price we expected something much better
Manager Response: Dear Javier Perez,  As the manager I am extremely shocked to read about your feelings regarding our property. I’m going to respond to each one of your complaints as best I can. California in general is an expensive state to visit and Orange County, CA is no different. Our rates are competitively priced to the area as we are sold out nightly. We have all the popular amenities among guests that non-resort hotels should have, for instance complimentary breakfast, free wifi, free parking, 24 hour front desk service, coffee in lobby, daily housekeeping. I am proud to say that our top three compliments are our staff, comfort of bed and cleanliness of rooms. The nights you stayed, the area had unusually high winds that made the news with uncontrollable L.A. fires. The winds were so high that last night you stayed, my backyard fence toppled over. What would have caused you to write that you would only pay $30 for a night with us? This baffles me as that would not even cover our cost to maintain the room and looking at Motel 6, they charge $60 - $70 weekdays in the area. I’m sorry that you did not like your stay at our property but I’m proud to say that we only charged you for two out of the five nights of your reservation. I adopt a customer friendly philosophy that if a guest is unsatisfied with their stay, they may check out without penalty.   The staff wishes you health and wealth in your future endeavors. I do not expect you stay with us again but I do hope you continue to stay with other Best Westerns.  Sincerely,  Michael Nuño Manager Best Western Orange Plaza

Summary: Visited my son who lives in Orange, CA.  Sisters and I stayed here for one night.  Room small, musty and very sad looking.  Appliances were old.  One lamp in room.  One light in toilet. Room decor sad looking, outdated everywhere in room. Bathroom is nightmare.  One light in shower. Walk in shower gets water all over bathroom floor, almost up to your toilet.  I did not feel very clean staying here. Nightmare.
Manager Response: Victoria,  As a manager who takes pride in making my hotel the best that it can be, it is a shock to read of your opinions. The first thing I noticed when reviewing your reservation is that you booked our ADA compliant room also known as our handicap room which explains the walk-in shower. I do realize this upsets you and if you did not need the handicap room it makes sense. Our website details each room, sometimes one may book our handicap room (not knowing that it is a handicap room) out of necessity because it is our only room available for date needed by guest or the details are over looked and the room is booked. We maintain a clean, comfortable and friendly hotel at all times. While we are sorry that you did not appreciate us I do want potential future guests to know that 90% of our guests say they would come back and that can be verified by reading all of our positive reviews.  Thank you and Happy Holidays!

Summary: I got this hotel to go to Disneyland with my family. I would recommend it to my friends and family. I thought it had good presentation the rooms are clean and nice. The beds are comfortable. Breakfast offered was good. Not a big selection but good.
Manager Response: Thelma,  Thank you for your wonderful review of our property. We value each guests opinion and  will continue to meet all your needs as we thrive to achieve high standards. We are not associated with Disneyland but will continue to be of monetary worth just outside the expensive hotels and close enough to get there in 10 minutes.  The entire Best Western Orange Plaza staff sends our gratitude and Happy Holidays!

Summary: This is my go-to spot for Orange Circle. It’s no amazing hotel but its a good, reliable, consistent spot and close to all the dining, bars & shops of the Orange Circle area. They’ve added a full breakfast since my prior stay, but I slept through that...
Manager Response: David,  Thank you for such a positive review. We are lucky to be within such a great area. We know who we are and we try to run with it. Please ask to speak with manager Michael during your next visit and I'll make sure you get a discount for your stay.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Very helpful and friendly staff. Rooms were clean and orderly. Slept well but all the pillows were to "fluffy" and had a "crunch" to them. I had brought my own pillow so not an issue. If I were flying pillows would have been very uncomfortable. Breakfast was mediocre at best, I did not finish my meal but not a deal breaker. I would stay again.
Manager Response: Paul,  Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate the pros and cons you have listed. We would of liked to of done a better job in making you feel comfortable. We are looking into pillow options with Best Western and we are always looking for ways to improve our breakfast.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Best Western’s have pretty much become glorified Motel 6’s. Outdated decor, wall heaters, unclean feeling rooms, and the exterior is awful. This hotel in particular was awful. We will never stay here.
Manager Response: Tom,  The entire staff is dissapointed that you feel this way. We put forth our best effort to make every guests visit enjoyable, however we understand that no matter how hard we try we can not please everyone. We hope you find what you're looking for and we will continue to put our best foot forward to making someone's life special.  Thank you

Summary: This hotel was great for us because it is just four miles from Disney Land. It is easy to take a cab and you don't have to fight the traffic. It was an enjoyable stay at this hotel. There was plenty of shops, stores and restaurants in the area around the hotel.
Manager Response: David,  It was a pleasure hosting you for your stay. We appreciate the information you are providing potential guests in the future. The staff at Best Western Orange Plaza takes pride in doing our jobs right so that each guest can have an enjoyable experience.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Average hotel with good pricing. Location was very nice, about 5 mins away from a mall and a grocery store is right across the street. Disneyland is about 10 mins away. Breakfast was excellent. Pool isn’t heated so it was super cold, room had a weird odor, sink wasn’t draining well.
Manager Response: Salma,  Thank you for staying us and trying out our hotel. I'm glad to see the good mixed in with the bad in your review. I was able to fix the odor situation in the room you stayed in and the sink drain. Your comments help future guests decide to stay with us and we appreciate your time.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: Great for our 2 day visit to the university & some touring.  A very basic motel-type, older property. Down side is you can't keep drapes open if you want privacy since they face the corridor to the outside; and I happen to like lots of natural light.  That said, we didn't spend much time at the hotel itself, so worked well for us.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  Thank you for staying with us. We are always glad to host Chapman University parents. We are glad you had a good experience and hope to see you back in the future.  We appreciate the time you took to review our property.   Thank you

Summary: The staff is so friendly and the amenities are great. We always stay at this BW because it is close to our business and our family. The motel is small and has that family atmosphere. This is the only motel we stay in when in Orange, California. We can highly recommend this BW

This hotel was great. The staff was amazing and very courteous. The room was more than we expected and always was clean. The breakfast that was provided was good and filling and check out process was easy.
Manager Response: Bonnie,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review of our property, your comments are very much valued. We really appreciate your comments regarding our cleanliness. Our staff members take their roles in our industry very seriously and try, every day, to provide that quality customer service, that our guests expect. Our commitment to investing in our property will continue with renovations to our lobby and business center areas. Thank you again, and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Orange!

Summary: Too many people smoking on the balcony's in the middle of the night. I counted at least 3 fire truck and ambulances blaring down the street. There is a grocery store and restaurants within walking distance which was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to review our property. We are a no smoking hotel which means guests are not allowed to smoke in our rooms. Guests have a right to smoke outside and we do not have the right to tell them that they can not smoke. I do have designated locations for guests to smoke and enforce our designated smoking rules to guests. The next time I will be glad to enforce these rules, please let the front desk know next time by dialing 0 we are here 24 hours a day to help. Emergency vehicle sirens are there for public safety and there is nothing we can do about this.   We truly appreciate every review we can get and thank you for letting travelers know about the Ralphs grocery store and many restaurants within walking distance.

Summary Heading: Best Western Orange Plaza - great home away from home!
Summary: I regularly stay at this hotel for work at nearby St. Joseph's Hospital.  Very pleasant and convenient for my work, with everything you could possibly need nearby.  Front desk staff, particularly Cindy, always very pleasant and accommodating. David is also very nice and helpful.  Room clean and comfortable bed.  Breakfast is simple and nice.  I'm really glad to have found this hotel to stay during my work weeks in Orange.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. Tran,  The whole Best Western Orange Plaza wants to thank you for continually staying with us for business. We appreciate that you reviewed and commented on the hotel as this helps us to reach a broader audience. We’re extremely happy that you found us, look out for an extra discount this coming stay.  Have an excellent day :)  Michael Nuño

Summary: Great price for this place, clean rooms a little on the small size but adequate, helpful staff, the breakfast was average but cant beat the price , Good place if you just need a place to sleep and be on your way.
Manager Response: Hello,  These are some great things you had to say about us and we have to concur with your views. We receive many reviews like yours, this is who we are and we hope to deliver superior customer service for every guest that stays with us.   Thank you for staying with us, please stop by and see me next time. I would like to personally thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Booked this hotel because it was close to the orange fair. Was not sure what to expect but it was a cute little hotel and the staff was wonderful. Pillows were not too comfy but overall it was a good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for the Orange International Street Fair. We are always delighted to hear that a guest was satisfied with their stay. The single most important thing a guest can do for us is to leave a review, we really appreciate that. Please visit us again and mention this review for a 15% off discount. We want to encourage guests like your self to stay with us when in the area.

Summary: well to begin with i had some changes to make for our trip and michael the front desk mgr. was incredibly accommidating. he was helpful and happy to help, not grudgingly. i was pleased with the room it was very clean and spacious. michael was also more than glad to give us an early check in. i was just so pleasantly surprised at the overall stay. i would absolutly reccommend   this best western to stay at. very close to chapman university and the breakfast was good. michael was a great customer service guy . made me feel very welcome. great job
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel, and for taking the time to write a review! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations. Our hotel aims to provide a truly unique experience, and we are thrilled that we were able to exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future.   Thank you

Summary Heading: Best Western Orange Plaza is the Best
Summary: Best Western of Orange Plaza is a great place to stay. The staff is helpful and courteous, the rooms are clean and well cared for and it is in the perfect location next to Disneyland  and the Anaheim Stadium. I always enjoy staying at the Best Western Orange Plaza Motel on Chapman and Main.
Manager Response: Daniel,  Thank you for staying with us. We are always happy to see you. You are a perfect guest and we can't wait to have you back.  Thank you again.

Summary: Great location near Hospital Medical Campus. I was able to walk to work and save on parking. Front desk was very helpful. Not very busy, and had a nice size pool. Staff was very helpful. Offered hot breakfast options.
Manager Response: Dear Pearl,  Thank you for your kinds words and the time you took to share them with us. It is great to hear, that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Rest ensured, that we will take you comments for further encouragement within the team to ensure personal service and warm welcome for your next visit. All the best and see you soon! Warm regards  Best Western Orange Plaza staff

Summary: Great staff. Great brekfest. Very helpful staff. They went out of the way to help me with my travel cards. Location is great there are several stores that are local and within walking distance. 👍🏻👍🏻
Manager Response: Hi Jason,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We work really hard to reflect the best hospitality in a great environment, and I’m glad to see those efforts pay off on your last visit. I will make sure that our staff gets the recognition they deserve.  Please introduce yourself to me next time you come in and I’ll make sure you get the 5-star treatment you deserve.  Hope to have you back soon. Michael N. Manager

Summary: In this case you get more than what you pay for. We paid $100 per night. An older facility in an older part of town but recently renovated. Immaculately clean room and bathroom.  Quiet. We felt very safe. The full breakfast, although not top of the line was very adequate and complete. Conveniently close by freeway to Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm. We  would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Janet,  Thank you for your stay with us at Best Western Orange Plaza. We were pleased to note that you appreciated the renovation and full breakfast, an aspect of out hotel that is preferred by many of our guests. Your encouraging review will help us constantly improve our breakfast services and we hope to welcome you back again in the near future!   Sincerely,  Michael N.

Summary: We stayed in a room with 2 beds, one bed had dirty sheets  we found several blood spot. front desk  staff no friendly very rude person. We stayed before  in Best Western Hotel but we never had this kind of experience.
Manager Response: Christoper,  We apologize for the situation you encountered. The hotels' policy on check outs is to remove all bed sheets, wash them. After washing sheets if they still have stains they are to throw them away and put new sheets in room. I want you to know that this incident does not reflect the clean hotel reputation that we have. You can verify our outstanding reviews to see how satisfied guests are with our cleanliness.  When you notified us of the situation I was involved and so were two other employees. I feel at no time was anyone rude or unfriendly to you. We asked you standard question so that we could see the situation as a whole, for instance if both beds were wrong and which of the two beds did you find wrong. The housekeepers were called and asked who cleaned the room and why would the sheet look as it did. I offered you 50% off your room and asked if you were satisfied with compensation and you replied yes.  Once again we apologize for your experience and will take proper steps to make sure this one incident does not happen again.

Summary: Hard to go wrong here at Orange Plaza. Extra comfortable beds, clean carpets, quiet rooms, family friendly, good for business travel etc. good food near by and downtown Orange not to far away. Just say yes to this one!
Manager Response: Curtis,  Thank you for always coming back. It's great to see and hear from you. As you saw we are in the middle of a remodel, when we done we want you everyone to enjoy the fruits of our labor. I want to thank you one more time for recognizing what we have to offer and letting the world know about your thoughts on us.

Summary: Nice place.  Will likely be nicer still once the front desk area renovations are completed.  The 3 bed option (2 room suite) was a bit crowded in and the extra bedroom does not have separate AC so closing the door for privacy means no access to the room's AC.  A small AC unit in that room would be helpful, especially during hot summer months.  That said, the upgrade cost for the additional room was worth the price for the extra Double bed and semi private room.
Manager Response: Beverly,  The entire Best Western Orange Plaza staff sends many thank yous for staying with us. We appreciate the valuable feedback you have added to our online presence and look forward to housing you in the future. Thank you

Summary Heading: Some many businesses close by, disneyland wasnt far at all we could hear the fireworks going off at night..
Summary: My children and I loved the swimming pool, the breakfast we received here was so good, the employee's were helpful and accommodate everything we asked for, there is a beautiful park near by to wall ball
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for your trip. Your review of our property will help future guests decide if they want to stay with us or not. I look forward to seeing you again in the future.  We wish you and your family all the best.

Summary: We were greeted by a friendly professional behind the desk.  After a day of sight seeing, we returned to a clean, quiet room.  In the morning we enjoyed the amenities of the hotel provided breakfast. Although there was renovation happening, there was a little noise in the lunch area, but was kept to a minimum, as well as dust or clutter. The surrounding area seemed to be quiet and safe as well.
Manager Response: We are so happy you had a good nights rest with us. We do what we can to make every guests stay as comfortable as can be. Also, thank you for taking note on how quiet and safe the area is. The area isn't called old towne orange for no reason. Please visit us again, I would like to meet you.

Summary: Best Western Orange Plaza is a great place to stay. The staff is professional and very helpful . Check in and check out is easy. The rooms are clean. There is no noise at night. Everything at Best Western Orange Plaza is the best.
